dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependent_to.description: Kyoto Cabinet is a library of routines for managing a database.
dependent_to.name: kyotocabinet

dependent_to.description:
libarchive: C library and command-line tools for reading and writing
tar, cpio, zip, ISO, and other archive formats.
dependent_to.name: libarchive

dependent_to.description:
A compression utility that excels at compressing large files (usually >
10-50 MB). Larger files and/or more free RAM means that the utility will
be able to more effectively compress your files (ie: faster / smaller
size), especially if the filesize(s) exceed 100 MB. You can either
choose to optimise for speed (fast compression / decompression) or size,
but not both.
dependent_to.name: lrzip

dependent_to.description:
lzop is a file compressor which is very similar to gzip. lzop uses the
LZO data compression library for compression services, and its main
advantages over gzip are much higher compression and decompression speed
(at the cost of some compression ratio).
dependent_to.name: lzop

dependent_to.description: Interface to the LZO compression library
dependent_to.name: perl-compress-lzo

dependent_to.description: Kyoto Cabinet is a library of routines for managing a database.
dependent_to.name: perl-kyotocabinet

dependent_to.description:
This module provides Python bindings for the LZO data compression
library.
dependent_to.name: py-python-lzo

dependent_to.description:
PyTables is a package for managing hierarchical datasets and designed to
efficiently and easily cope with extremely large amounts of data.
dependent_to.name: py-tables

dependent_to.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE
dependent_to.name: squashfuse

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Build shared libs, static libs or both
variants.name: libs
